name: CardPG
description:
CardPG is a game made for Ludum Dare 41, combining the RPG and Card genres. Collect Coins and Cards on your journey through an old overrun castle, with special items helping you along your way.

--- CONTROLS ---

Space to start (You may need to click on the screen first)

Arrow keys to move around

Just walk over coins and cards to get them

Drag cards around with the mouse

Drag cards into the discard pile to use them (If they disappear then they are used up)

--- CARDS ---

Water - Replenish 20 HP

Mandrake - Replenish 75 HP

Barrier - Block off enemies

Tar - Slow down enemies
